item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, October 22, 2024 at 1:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Math is still catching up to the genius of Ramanujan (76 points | 34 comments)
2. First images from Euclid are in (139 points | 34 comments)
3. An amateur historian has discovered a long-lost short story by Bram Stoker (217 points | 87 comments)
4. Overengineering a way to know if people are in my university's CS lab (115 points | 51 comments)
5. Transitioning the Use of Cryptographic Algorithms and Key Lengths (34 points | 16 comments)
6. Show HN: Data Formulator – AI-powered data visualization from Microsoft Research (20 points | discuss)
7. Show HN: Epublifier – scrape pages (books, manuals) for offline reading (247 points | 39 comments)
8. Thought experiments that fray the fabric of space-time (48 points | 53 comments)
9. Scalene: A high-performance, high-precision CPU, GPU, memory profiler for Python (32 points | 1 comment)
10. Mind Wandering: More than a Bad Habit (2018) [pdf] (43 points | 20 comments)
11. Show HN: Floating point arithmetic types in C++ for any size and any base (60 points | 22 comments)
12. New discovery reveals how diatoms capture CO2 so effectively (28 points | 3 comments)
13. __init__.py files are optional. Here's why you should still use them (14 points | 18 comments)
14. Rope ROM of the Wang 720C desktop computer (12 points | discuss)
15. Please do not write below the line (244 points | 217 comments)
16. IOCCC Flight Simulator (2010) (145 points | 21 comments)
17. Egypt declared malaria-free after 100-year effort (491 points | 53 comments)
18. Scientists working to decode birdsong (134 points | 118 comments)
19. Software Engineering Body of Knowledge (SWEBOK) v4.0 is out [pdf] (116 points | 50 comments)
20. Workaround Clang v15 AArch64 miscompile that affects parallel collection (56 points | 5 comments)
21. Machine Learning to Computational Plasma Physics Reduced-Order Plasma Modeling (15 points | 1 comment)
22. ByteDance sacks intern for sabotaging AI project (120 points | 150 comments)
23. Waking up science's sleeping beauties (2023) (59 points | 25 comments)
24. Morsle – A daily Morse code challenge (103 points | 34 comments)
25. Baidu CEO: AI 'bubble' will burst 99 percent of players (25 points | 12 comments)
26. Jiga (YC W21) Is Hiring a Full Stack Engineer (React/Mongo/Node) ( | hide)
27. Plankton balloon to six times size in newly discovered mode of oceanic travel (81 points | 11 comments)
28. Civet: A Superset of TypeScript (55 points | 44 comments)
29. “The Secret History of the Mongols”: A digital history approach (50 points | 12 comments)
30. Vanity of Vanities: Fool's Cap Map of the World (Ca. 1585) (12 points | discuss)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, October 22, 2024 at 1:15 AM UTC
